Posts.EditableText: So, a while back I accidentally deleted the files I need to edit my game (Forgotten). And now I want to edit it but the files are not there anymore, is there anyway to retrieve the files back so I can edit my game once again?
Posts.HTML: So, a while back I accidentally deleted the files I need to edit my game (Forgotten). And now I want to edit it but the files are not there anymore, is there anyway to retrieve the files back so I can edit my game once again?

Posts.EditableText: Sort of. Did you ever publish your game on the Quest website? If so (and if you're ok with code view), you can reconstruct your original files by downloading the .quest file, renaming it to .zip and opening it. There will be a game.aslx file in there that has all your source combined with the libraries. You should be able to extract your code (with some effort) back to editable files.
Posts.HTML: Sort of. Did you ever publish your game on the Quest website? If so (and if you're ok with code view), you can reconstruct your original files by downloading the .quest file, renaming it to .zip and opening it. There will be a game.aslx file in there that has all your source combined with the libraries. You should be able to extract your code (with some effort) back to editable files.

Posts.EditableText: Yes, it is published to the Quest Website. And I've tried it - it works! Thanks alot jaynabonne, now I'm going to work on my game.
Posts.HTML: Yes, it is published to the Quest Website. And I've tried it - it works! Thanks alot jaynabonne, now I'm going to work on my game.
